name: Submachine: Future Loop Foundation
summary: Expect the unexpected. 50 days after releasing Submachine 4: the Lab here is a brand new submachine for You to play. It was made especially for the Future Loop Foundation, so don’t be surprized if you find elements pointing to that band and their latest album, “Memories from a fading room” within the game. Basically it’s out of the main storyline, but there are few elements that could lead You to some interesting theories about the meaning of the submachine itself.
